descriptions: A standard single room designed for budget-conscious travelers, offering a small but functional space. The room features a single bed, a compact work desk, and a modest bathroom with basic amenities. It's perfect for solo travelers who need a comfortable and affordable stay.

A deluxe double room with a queen-sized bed and a private balcony. This room offers a quiet retreat with a lovely view of the hotel gardens. It includes a minibar, a seating area, and a spacious bathroom with premium toiletries. Ideal for couples or business travelers seeking a touch of luxury.

This room is perfect for families, featuring two double beds and a sofa bed in a separate living area. It includes a kitchenette with a small refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker. The room offers ample space and privacy, ideal for families with children or small groups.

A premium suite with a king-sized bed and a large living area. This suite features a private terrace with a panoramic view of the city. The room is furnished with a luxurious bathroom, including a spa bath, and a minibar stocked with complimentary drinks and snacks.

An economy double room with twin beds, perfect for friends or budget travelers. The room includes a small work desk and a private bathroom with a shower. It's an excellent choice for those who need a comfortable yet affordable place to stay.

A junior suite designed for business travelers. It features a spacious work area with high-speed internet, a queen-sized bed, and a separate living space. The room also includes a minibar and a small kitchenette, providing everything needed for a comfortable stay.

This standard twin room offers a comfortable stay with two single beds. It's designed for friends or colleagues traveling together. The room includes a compact work desk, a small seating area, and a private bathroom with basic toiletries.

A deluxe single room with a city view, ideal for business travelers or solo tourists. It features a queen-sized bed, a work desk, and a large bathroom with premium toiletries. The room also includes a small balcony where guests can relax and enjoy the view.

This luxurious penthouse suite features a private rooftop terrace with stunning city views. The room is equipped with a king-sized bed, a large living area, and a fully equipped kitchen. Ideal for special occasions or high-end travelers, this suite offers a unique and memorable stay.
special_offers: Free airport transfer with 3+ nights stay

descriptions: An accessible room designed for guests with special needs. It includes a wide doorway, grab bars in the bathroom, and an accessible shower. The room features a queen-sized bed and a small work desk, ensuring a comfortable stay for all guests.

A triple room suitable for families or groups. It features three single beds, a small seating area, and a private bathroom with a shower. The room is designed for comfort and convenience, with ample space for guests to relax and unwind.

A deluxe suite with a king-sized bed and a large living area. This suite features a grand piano, a fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious bathroom. Ideal for special occasions or high-end travelers, this suite offers luxury and comfort.

A cozy single room designed for budget travelers. It features a single bed, a small desk, and a compact bathroom with basic amenities. Although compact, this room provides everything needed for a comfortable stay at an affordable price.

This room features a king-sized bed, a work desk, and a small kitchenette. It's ideal for business travelers or couples looking for a comfortable stay with a bit of extra space. The room also includes a private balcony with city views.

An economy double room with twin beds, designed for budget-conscious travelers. This room includes a small work desk, a compact seating area, and a private bathroom with basic amenities. It's a great choice for those who need a comfortable yet affordable place to stay.

A junior suite with a spacious living area and a king-sized bed. This room features a private balcony, a large bathroom, and a minibar. It's ideal for couples or business travelers seeking a luxurious and comfortable stay.
special_offers: Free bottle of wine for couples

descriptions: An economy single room with a single bed and a compact work desk. It's designed for students or solo travelers seeking an affordable stay. The room includes a small private bathroom with a shower, providing everything needed for a comfortable experience.

This standard double room features twin beds and a private bathroom with a shower. Ideal for friends or couples traveling together, this room offers a compact yet comfortable space with all the basic amenities. Great for budget-conscious travelers.

A deluxe suite with a large living area, featuring a grand piano and a fully equipped kitchen. The room has a king-sized bed, a spacious bathroom, and a private terrace. Ideal for high-end travelers or those seeking luxury and comfort.

An economy double room with twin beds, designed for budget-conscious travelers. This room includes a small work desk, a compact seating area, and a private bathroom with basic amenities. It's a great choice for those who need a comfortable yet affordable place to stay.
